title: Is this a real quote from Nelson Mandela?
subtitle: A quote from Mandela, former President of South Africa, said: "Peanuts divide themselves by race, colour, sex or religion."
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: Nelson Mandela said: "Our world is not divided by race, colour, sex or religion. Our world is divided into wise and stupid people. The fools themselves are divided by race, colour, sex or religion."
